definition: to build (a hut etc) on stilts/to install (power lines etc) overhead/(fig.) unfounded/impractical/(fig.) to make sb a mere figurehead
to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: The trolley bus picks up current from an overhead wire.
sentences.chinese: 電車的電能是通過架空線供給的。

sentences.english: Discuss the technique of using the Auto- optimize makeup on overhead - line program.
sentences.chinese: 論述架空送電線路自動優化排位程序的應用技巧。

sentences.english: The device used for sending the waves off into space is known as aerial or antenna.
sentences.chinese: 電波送入太空的裝置稱爲架空線或天線。

sentences.english: Sag checking is an important method to insure the safe operating of transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 弧垂檢測是保證架空輸電線路安全運行的重要措施。

sentences.english: Overhead in the shadow of a sudden invasion plot Zhongzhou world.
sentences.chinese: 劇情架空在陰影突然侵襲中州世界。

sentences.english: An aerial cableway is set up across the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 一條架空索道橫跨於黃河之上。

sentences.english: The lightning protection and grounding are very important for passenger ropeways safe operation.
sentences.chinese: 防雷接地是保證客運架空索道安全運營的重要環節。

sentences.english: The value of standard sag is an important factor to measure and control the sag of transmission line.
sentences.chinese: 標準弧垂是新建架空線路弧垂測控的重要依據之一。

sentences.english: Aluminium-magnesium-silicon alloy wire for overhead line conductors.
sentences.chinese: 架空導線用鋁鎂硅合金導線。

sentences.english: Politics, more than funding, has kept judgeships empty.
sentences.chinese: 政治活動和更多的資金架空了法官的地位。

sentences.english: During the stringing of overhead line conductors, only the percentage sag tolerance is usually given.
sentences.chinese: 一般對架空線施工的弛度只提出一個誤差率的要求。

sentences.english: Suitable for pipe, channel, cable trenches, aerial, direct burial and so on.
sentences.chinese: 適合管道，槽道，電纜溝，架空，直埋等敷設方式。

sentences.english: Measuring aerial power line vibration is a key link of anti-vibration design of conductors .
sentences.chinese: 架空電力線振動測量是導線防振設計的重要環節。

sentences.english: ACSR is now widely used in overhead power transmission lines.
sentences.chinese: 鋼芯鋁絞線目前大量用於架空輸電線路。

sentences.english: Normally change to land type cable or overhead lines at shore.
sentences.chinese: 一般轉化爲陸地類型電纜或者架空線。

definition: to check and balance (power)/checks and balances
to place in a certain position/to assign to a job/to plant/resettlement (old)
to dismiss from office/to ban/to reject
to be in a position of power
seat of honor/person in a high-ranking position/to be promoted to a more senior role/(genetics) epistatic
to dismiss and replace (sb)/to replace (sb or sth)
